overview: With his inquisitive nature and Charlie Brown hairline, PBS's spunky hero CAILLOU has charmed both preschoolers and parents alike. Based on a series of Canadian children's books, the popular cartoon follows the adventures of the four-year-old as he explores the world around him and learns valuable life lessons through a mix of animation, live action, and puppetry.
title: Caillou's Playschool Adventures
